text:
Hi all,
I want to get all the choices (both name and label) for the options of deal stage.
Approach I took is get any deal, get pipeline id and then iterate over all the stages of the pipeline.

This doesn't give the stage name.

I couldn't find a api to give name of a stage. Any help is appreciated.

Thanks
Hi
I have question. I want to use invoice related api, do I need to create developer account first?

Hi, I'm trying to add a custom label to an association and it seems that the label primary contact is removed when i send a post command. Type it is 1 for my custom label and also it seems to be 1 for the HubSpot created primary contact label. Anyone else that has seen this? I what to add a custom label between a contact and a company.
Hi! Request-response?
PUT to /crm/v4/objects/contacts/{contactId}/associations/company/{companyId}

with the data
associationCategory = "USER_DEFINED",
associationTypeId = 1
Before adding my custom label
And after adding my custom label the Primary is gone
And i have this
I can add the primary in the web ui and get all labels using GET to /crm/v4/objects/contacts/{contactId}/associations/company
your custom label cannot has  TypeId=1
coz it's reserved for primary label
ok
it was added in the ui
can you get <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/companies>
and find there your custom label

"{\"results\":[{\"category\":\"HubSpot_DEFINED\",\"typeId\":279,\"label\":null},{\"category\":\"HubSpot_DEFINED\",\"typeId\":1,\"label\":\"Primary\"},{\"category\":\"USER_DEFINED\",\"typeId\":1,\"label\":\"Superuser\"}]}"
yes i did that
:thinking_face: could you send me full response body as a file?
Seems to be a problem with PUT to /crm/v4/objects/contacts/{contactId}/associations/company/{companyId} will check how to create a ticket for this
thank you <@U05EJLL49KQ> for helping me finding an alternative solution for now using api v3 .
Hi, From where I can get the appId to pass in this api */crm/v3/extensions/accounting/settings/{appId}*
I think in your developer account. Then clicking into the corresponding app and in Auth tab is the AppID
Or even just in the URL when selecting the app in your developer account

Hi, everyone!
Does anyone know, how can I get *social posts statistics* other than clicks?
currently using GET /broadcast/v1/broadcasts/:broadcast_guid or GET /broadcast/v1/broadcasts

likes, replies, contacts, impressions, ...

:wave-yeti:Hello,

Something curious is happening to me. When I use the forms API and in the submit I have a file attached to the form. The file does not open correctly. Some of them do open correctly. But in this case it does not. It opens a new tab, but does not download the file. only shows the loading.

for the files I am sending PRIVATE access.

```{
    access: 'PRIVATE',
    ttl: 'P3M',
    overwrite: false,
    duplicateValidationStrategy: 'NONE',
    duplicateValidationScope: 'EXACT_FOLDER',
}```
I am a superuser on HubSPot.

Does anyone have any idea what it could be?

Hello,

I'm using latest cli and following tutorials to set up my very first project and app, but it's asking for `$.data.fetch` .

```âœ– Failed to upload myProject project files to jaySandbox (*******)
[ERROR] The post in account ******* was bad. The JSON in the file '/app/extensions/example-card.json' doesn't match the associated scheme. Correct and/or add values to all relevant fields and try again. 
- $.data.fetch: is missing but it is required```
This field seems it is a deprecated field, it is not included in examples,

Also it says <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/convert-a-json-based-card-to-full-stack-ui-extension#updates-to-the-example-card-json-file|here> it's a no longer needed field:
```You no longer need to include the fetch object or targetFunction```
Does anyone have a clue what might be wrong?
